TopicTitle: Have the cursor be visible while in IVA

Articles.Content:
What the title says. I may have toggled something by accident, but whenever I go into IVA I can't see my cursor. So I can't actually click on any of the controls from inside the capsule. It's not a big deal (since I'm not in there quite often) but it would be nice to know why it's turned invisible.

Edited July 7, 2013 by PTNLemay

Silly me... I found it. You just right-click.
